page.title: 03Ilchester school pupils
page.content:
{Approx.50%}of pupils are from {service families}at R.N.A.S.Yeovilton. Their transient nature helps to create the lack of balance in class sizes.A total of{107 navy pupils}have registered this year,41% of the school and a similar percentage will have left by the end of term. In addition we have several{overseas pupils;}13 Indians,1 Italian,1 German and 1 French causing some initial language problems. The school population, comprising varied cultural and community interests, provides an exciting and challenging environment which we try to stabilise through the academic and social aspects of school life.
TREVOR SMITH HEADMASTER
